name: Krolyanoid
description:
This is a simple and calm arkanoid.

It is the first game I created. Here you can relax and kill time, like in the kind good Arkanoid.

The game is suitable for both children and adults.

Control the platform with keyboard arrows. Destroy all the blocks to go to the next level. There are no savegames yet, because the game is quite small.

Responses from my friends: I remember such games from childhood, nostalgia. Thank you.
